channel.title: Word Up
channel.description: Open your mind every Tuesday and Thursday with a fun 3 minute vocabulary lesson! Desmond teaches you smart words and how to use them to help you feel more intelligent and civilized.

image.title: Word Up
image.description: Open your mind every Tuesday and Thursday with a fun 3 minute vocabulary lesson! Desmond teaches you smart words and how to use them to help you feel more intelligent and civilized.

channel.itunes:author: desmond@yakkyakk.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Open your mind every Tuesday and Thursday with a fun 3 minute vocabulary lesson! Desmond teaches you smart words and how to use them to help you feel more intelligent and civilized.
channel.itunes:summary: Open your mind every Tuesday and Thursday with a fun 3 minute vocabulary lesson! Desmond teaches you smart words and how to use them to help you feel more intelligent and civilized.
channel.itunes:keywords: Vocabulary, Words, Definition, Education, Language, Linguistics, Word History, Yakkyakk, Yakk, Yakkyakk.com

item.title: 29, Tongue Tie Up
item.description: Episode 1: Thought "Twister" was a game for kids. Try this one its a twist, for your tongue.
